#summary IPTWeather installation steps.

  * Install <a href="http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=508429" target="_blank">MiToNiOeS' iPhoneToday</a> or <a href="http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=633618" target="_blank">tronikos' iPhoneToday</a> and/or <a href="http://s2u2.ac-s2.com/" target="_blank">S2U2</a><br />
  * Install <a href="http://www.sto-helit.de/index.php?module=download&amp;action=view&amp;entry=65" target="_blank">Mortscript <b>4.2</b></a><br />
  * Install <a href="http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=607102" target="_blank">Sleuth's myLocation Service</a> if you want to use the 'My Location' feature<br />
  * Install the latest IPTWeather cab file provided <a href="http://code.google.com/p/iptweather/downloads/list" target="_blank">here</a><br />
  * To use IPTWeather with iPhoneToday, extract an icon set (<a href="http://iptweather.googlecode.com/files/accuweathericons.zip" target="_blank">accuweathericons.zip</a> or <a href="http://iptweather.googlecode.com/files/spilicons.zip" target="_blank">spilicons.zip</a> below or from other users) into your IPTWeather folder (should have an accuweathericons or spilicon or whatever folder in the IPTWeather folder). Please read the <a href="http://code.google.com/p/iptweather/wiki/FAQ" target="_blank">FAQ</a> on how to disable the use of IPTWeather with iPhoneToday.<br />
  * To use IPTWeather with S2U2, extract <a href="http://iptweather.googlecode.com/files/S2U2wallpaper_20100104.zip" target="_blank">S2U2wallpapers.zip</a> and <a href="http://iptweather.googlecode.com/files/S2U2icons.zip" target="_blank">S2U2icons.zip</a> (or <a href="http://iptweather.googlecode.com/files/S2U2spilicons.zip" traget="_blank">S2U2spilicons.zip</a>) into your \Program files\S2U2\gfx folder (Overwrite files if prompted). You should have a wallpaper folder and a weather folder in the S2U2\gfx folder.  Please read the <a href="http://code.google.com/p/iptweather/wiki/FAQ" target="_blank">FAQ</a> on how to disable the use of IPTWeather with S2U2.<br />
  * Edit the <a href="http://code.google.com/p/iptweather/wiki/Configuration" target="_blank">weather.ini file</a> to match your preferences. (the weather.ini file you get at the beginning is from my device to use ITPWeather with S2U2 and iPhoneToday)<br />
  * In iPhoneToday, if you want the current weather icon to show weather forecasts when you tap on it, you have to edit the iPhoneToday icon numbered IPTWcurrentWeatherIcon on the page IPTWcurrentWeatherPage (weather.ini file settings), and set the 'Execute' field to call the script *iPhoneTodayAccuWeather.mscr*.<br />
  * Restart your phone or just run startAccuWeather.mscr<br />

*For more information on how to use/configure IPTWeather, please check the <a href="http://code.google.com/p/iptweather/wiki/FAQ" target="_blank">FAQ</a>.*
